00025 #include <robot/control/kinematics/ManipulatorState>
00026 
00027 using robot::control::kinematics::ManipulatorState;
00028 
00029 ManipulatorState::ManipulatorState(ref<robot::Manipulator> manipulator)
00030 {
00031   if (manipulator->type() != robot::Manipulator::Serial)
00032     throw std::invalid_argument(Exception("only SerialManipulators are currently supported"));
00033 
00034   this->manipulator = narrow_ref<robot::SerialManipulator>(manipulator);
00035 
00036   N = 6; // assumed
00037   
00038 
00039 
00040 }
00041 
00042 ManipulatorState::ManipulatorState(const ManipulatorState& m)
00043 {
00044   throw std::runtime_error(Exception("unimplemented"));//!!!  
00045 }
